description: FastAPI application entry point and configuration
acceptance_criteria: FastAPI app starts on port 8000, includes CORS middleware, and mounts all API routes

description: Application configuration and environment variable management
acceptance_criteria: Loads environment variables for database, JWT, encryption keys, and external service configurations

description: Database connection, session management, and SQLAlchemy setup
acceptance_criteria: Establishes PostgreSQL connection pool, provides database sessions, and supports encryption

description: JWT token handling, password hashing, and RBAC utilities
acceptance_criteria: Creates and validates JWT tokens, hashes passwords securely, and enforces role-based access

description: Policy SQLAlchemy model with vehicle, location, and coverage details
acceptance_criteria: Defines policy table with encrypted PII fields, relationships to claims, and all required search fields

description: Claims SQLAlchemy model with policy relationships and claim-level policy data
acceptance_criteria: Defines claim table with policy foreign key, claim-level policy override fields, and status tracking

description: Payment and disbursement SQLAlchemy models with multiple payment methods
acceptance_criteria: Defines payment tables with encrypted payment info, reserve line allocation, and lifecycle tracking

description: User authentication and role management model
acceptance_criteria: Defines user table with hashed passwords, roles, and audit trail links

description: Audit logging model for all CRUD operations
acceptance_criteria: Defines audit table capturing user, timestamp, action type, and changed data for all operations

description: Pydantic schemas for policy request/response validation
acceptance_criteria: Defines policy create/update/response schemas with proper validation and field masking

description: Pydantic schemas for claims request/response validation
acceptance_criteria: Defines claim schemas with policy relationship validation and claim-level policy overrides

description: Pydantic schemas for payment processing and validation
acceptance_criteria: Defines payment schemas with sensitive data validation, amount constraints, and payee information

description: Authentication and authorization schemas
acceptance_criteria: Defines login, token response, and user role schemas with proper validation

description: Policy business logic including search, CRUD, and data masking
acceptance_criteria: Implements complex policy search, PII masking, and policy lifecycle management with audit logging

description: Claims processing business logic and workflow management
acceptance_criteria: Manages claims-to-policy relationships, claim-level policy edits, status tracking, and workflow rules

description: Payment processing, disbursement, and compliance management
acceptance_criteria: Handles payment lifecycle, reserve allocation, tax compliance, and integration with external processors

description: Audit logging service for all system operations
acceptance_criteria: Creates audit records for all CRUD operations with user context and data change tracking

description: Authentication and authorization business logic
acceptance_criteria: Handles user login, token management, role validation, and session management

description: Policy REST API endpoints for search, CRUD operations
acceptance_criteria: Provides policy search with all criteria, CRUD endpoints with proper validation and error handling

description: Claims REST API endpoints for management and processing
acceptance_criteria: Provides claims CRUD, history retrieval, status filtering, and claim-level policy editing endpoints

description: Payment processing REST API endpoints
acceptance_criteria: Provides payment creation, lifecycle management, disbursement, and reporting endpoints

description: Authentication and authorization API endpoints
acceptance_criteria: Provides login, logout, token refresh, and user management endpoints with proper security

description: Field-level encryption utilities for PII and payment data
acceptance_criteria: Provides encrypt/decrypt functions for SSN/TIN, payment info with key management

description: Input validation utilities and business rule enforcement
acceptance_criteria: Validates SSN/TIN formats, payment amounts, policy numbers, and other business constraints

description: Python dependency specifications
acceptance_criteria: Lists all required packages with versions for FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, authentication, and integrations

description: Main React application component with routing and layout
acceptance_criteria: Provides app layout, routing between pages, authentication wrapper, and error boundaries

description: TypeScript type definitions for all data models
acceptance_criteria: Defines interfaces for Policy, Claim, Payment, User, and API response types

description: HTTP client service for backend API communication
acceptance_criteria: Provides typed API methods for all endpoints with error handling and authentication headers

description: Frontend authentication service and token management
acceptance_criteria: Handles login/logout, token storage, automatic renewal, and authentication state

description: React context for global authentication state
acceptance_criteria: Provides authentication context with user info, roles, and login state management

description: Custom React hook for API calls with loading and error states
acceptance_criteria: Provides consistent API call pattern with loading, success, and error state management

description: Policy search page with multi-criteria search and results display
acceptance_criteria: Provides policy search form with all criteria, results table with sorting/filtering, and WCAG compliance

description: Policy details view and editing page
acceptance_criteria: Displays policy information with PII masking, editing capabilities, and claims history section

description: Claims history and management page
acceptance_criteria: Shows claims list with sorting by date, status filtering, and claim-level policy editing indicators

description: Payment creation and processing management page
acceptance_criteria: Provides payment forms for different methods, lifecycle tracking, and compliance features

description: Reusable policy search form component
acceptance_criteria: Provides search fields with validation, reset functionality, and responsive design

description: Sortable and filterable data table component
acceptance_criteria: Provides sorting, filtering, pagination, and accessibility features for tabular data

description: Payment processing form component with multiple payment methods
acceptance_criteria: Supports ACH, wire, card payments with validation, encryption, and PCI compliance

description: Audit trail display component
acceptance_criteria: Shows audit history with user, timestamp, action details, and data change tracking

description: Data formatting utilities for currency, dates, and PII masking
acceptance_criteria: Provides consistent formatting for SSN masking, currency display, and date formatting

description: Frontend dependency specifications and build scripts
acceptance_criteria: Lists React, TypeScript, testing, and UI dependencies with proper scripts for development and build

description: TypeScript compiler configuration for strict type checking
acceptance_criteria: Enables strict mode, proper module resolution, and React JSX support

description: Development environment with PostgreSQL and application services
acceptance_criteria: Provides PostgreSQL database, backend, and frontend services with proper networking and volumes

description: Environment variables template with all required configuration
acceptance_criteria: Lists all environment variables for database, JWT, encryption keys, and external service credentials
